member.name: P:Google.Ads.Gax.Config.AdsConfig.EnableProfiling
member.summary: A flag to determine whether or not to turn on profiling in the client library.

member.name: P:Google.Ads.Gax.Config.AdsConfig.UseChannelCache
member.summary: A flag to determine whether or not to enable channel cache in the client library.
member.remarks: This setting may be used to disable channel caching in advanced use cases where the library's default credential management is manually overridden.

member.name: P:Google.Ads.Gax.Config.AdsConfig.OAuth2PrnEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets the OAuth2 prn email.

member.name: P:Google.Ads.Gax.Config.AdsConfig.OAuth2ServiceAccountEmail
member.summary: Gets the OAuth2 service account email.
member.remarks: This setting is applicable only when using OAuth2 service accounts. This setting is read directly from the file referred to in setting.

member.name: P:Google.Ads.Gax.Config.AdsConfig.OAuth2PrivateKey
member.summary: Gets the OAuth2 private key for service account flow.
member.remarks: This setting is applicable only when using OAuth2 service accounts. This setting is read directly from the file referred to in setting.

member.name: P:Google.Ads.Gax.Config.AdsConfig.OAuth2SecretsJsonPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the OAuth2 secrets JSON file path.
member.remarks: This setting is applicable only when using OAuth2 service accounts.

member.name: P:Google.Ads.Gax.Config.AdsConfig.OAuth2Scope
member.summary: Gets or sets the OAuth2 scope. This is a comma separated string of all the scopes you want to use. This property has the default value https://www.googleapis.com/auth/adwords

member.name: M:Google.Ads.Gax.Interceptors.UnaryRpcInterceptor.ParseTaskException``1(System.AggregateException)
member.summary: Parses the task exception.
member.remarks: AggregateException is very close to a catch-all exception for Tasks. While all the situations that we know of involves this exception being thrown by an underlying RpcException, theoretically this method may return a null object, if the AggregateException is not caused by an RpcException. That would typically indicate an underlying issue with the code.

member.name: M:Google.Ads.Gax.Interceptors.UnaryRpcInterceptor.ParseRpcException``1(Grpc.Core.RpcException)
member.summary: Parses the RPC exception into a .
member.returns: The parsed exception, or a null if the parsing cannot be done.

member.summary: Extracts the RPC exception from an .
member.returns: the extracted , or null if an exception cannot be extracted.

member.summary: Invokes a client streaming call asynchronously. In client streaming scenario, client sends a stream of requests and server responds with a single response.
member.typeparam: Request message type for this call.
Request message type for this call.
member.param: The method details such as service and method names, marshallers for request and response, etc.
The host to which the call is made.

member.summary: Invokes a duplex streaming call asynchronously. In duplex streaming scenario, client sends a stream of requests and server responds with a stream of responses. The response stream is completely independent and both side can be sending messages at the same time.
member.typeparam: Request message type for this call.
Request message type for this call.
member.param: The method details such as service and method names, marshallers for request and response, etc.
The host to which the call is made.
member.returns: The duplex streaming call instance.
member.remarks: This method is not profiled and is passthru.

Request message type for this call.
member.param: The method details such as service and method names, marshallers for request and response, etc.
